Class TopicViewModel

Represents a view model for the Topic page.

Inheritance
System.Object
ViewModelBase
TopicViewModel
Implements

Namespace: MagicQuizDesktop.ViewModels
Assembly: MagicQuizDesktop.dll
Syntax
public class TopicViewModel : ViewModelBase, INotifyPropertyChanged
Remarks

This view model is used to handle the logic and data operations for the Topic page and window in the application.

TopicViewModel(ITopicRepository)

Initializes a new instance of the TopicViewModel class. Gets the current user and topics, initializes commands, and calls the Initialize function.

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

CanExecuteCommand(Object)

Determines whether the command can be executed based on certain conditions. It checks if the "TopicName" is not null or white space, and if the Id of "SelectedTopic" is greater than 0.

Declaration
public bool CanExecuteCommand(object obj)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Object obj

The object under consideration for executing the command.
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

Returns a boolean value indicating whether the command can be executed or not.
| Improve this Doc View Source

DeleteTopic()

Asynchronously deletes a topic by its name. If successful, it resets the selected topic and state. If an error occurs during the deletion, it sets error messages accordingly.

Declaration
public async Task DeleteTopic()
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task
| Improve this Doc View Source

Returns the ID of the topic.
| Improve this Doc View Source

GetTopics()

Asynchronously retrieves a list of topics from the Topic Repository. If successful, it populates the Topics and FilteredTopics properties, else an empty Observable Collection is returned. Any exceptions encountered are caught and an error message is set up.

Declaration
public async Task GetTopics()
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task
| Improve this Doc View Source

Initialize()

Initializes the instance by setting the TopicName according to the SelectedTopic. If the SelectedTopic is a new Topic, it sets up a new Topic for SelectedTopic and sets an empty string for TopicName.

Declaration
public void Initialize()
| Improve this Doc View Source

InitializeCommands()

Initialize Commands

Declaration
public void InitializeCommands()
| Improve this Doc View Source

MakeTopicObject()

Checks if TopicName is null or empty. If it is, sets a message and returns false. Otherwise, gets the TopicId by the TopicName. If TopicId is not found (equals 0), sets the TopicName. If TopicId is found, sets both the TopicName and Id of SelectedTopic. Returns true at the end of the method.

Declaration
public bool MakeTopicObject()
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean
| Improve this Doc View Source

| Improve this Doc View Source

TopicCommand()

Asynchronously performs the Topic command. If the selected topic is valid and has an ID higher than 0, it tries to update the topic. Otherwise, it tries to add the topic. It handles any exceptions and updates the appropriate message or error message fields, and resets the selected topic and other properties.

Declaration
public async Task TopicCommand()
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Implements

System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
